title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Lifehacker

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: $1.50 McDonald's cheeseburgers, get Metro 2033 Redux on PC for free, cheap Lenovo ThinkPad E580 laptops, 50% off Amazon Echo smart speakers and more!

1. Play Metro 2033 Redux free: The award-winning action-RPG Metro 2033 Redux is currently free to play on PC via the Epic Store. You can also get the 'reality simulation game' Everything. Click here and here, respectively.

2. $1.50 McDonald's cheeseburgers: For a limited time, you can get McDonald's best burger (it is known) for $1.50. To get the deal, download the MyMacca's app and click on the My Rewards section. Click here!

3. Cheap Lenovo ThinkPads: Lenovo is selling the 15.6-inch ThinkPad E580 for just $789. This is a great price for a very solid laptop - specs include an Intel i5-8250U CPU, 256GB SSD and 8GB of RAM. To get the deal, use the discount code 'TA-E580HOT' at checkout. Click here!

4. Early Bird Christmas sale: Catch is starting its Christmas deals early with up to 55% off bestselling toys from leading brands including Hot Wheels, Disney, Mattel and Lego. Click here!

5. 50% off Amazon Echo speakers: Amazon just released a bunch of new Echo devices so its clearing out old stock with prices slashed by 50%. The previous-generation Echo is currently going for $75.50 - down from $149. Click here!

6. Cheap NBN 100 plans: MyRepblic has smashed the price of its NBN 100 plans to $79.95 - down from as much as $99.95 a month. The catch is that the price jumps to $89.95 after the first six months. But that's still a very competitive price. Click here! You can also see the inclusions below:
